nodes.text: This Human male Galactic Republic Navy officer served with Jedi General Ki-Adi-Mundi in 21 BBY during the Clone Wars. During a battle near the moon of Cavamina Minor, Mundi's fleet faced a fleet of the Separatist Navy. The war profiteer Attuma Duum lured the two fleets to his asteroid base to ambush them with a minfefield in hopes of prolonging the war. In the midst of the battle, this officer informed General Mundi that the Republic starship Vagabond had been lost. General Mundi recalled the starfighters and his fleet left the battle.
This officer wore the uniform of the Republic Navy; he wore his brown hair cropped short and appeared to have a thin moustache.
This unnamed officer appears in a single frame in the graphic novella The Clone Wars: Deadly Hands of Shon-Ju.
